title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Digital Badge-Based Science Information Literacy Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply a three-step process to assess the credibility of scientific information in a VR simulation environment, achieving over 85% accuracy.
Learners can demonstrate information literacy competencies by completing over 90% of step-by-step missions (information retrieval–analysis–integration) to earn digital badges.
Learners can propose at least three strategies for utilizing scientific information using a peer feedback system (LMS-based), enhancing collaborative skills.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
